item.title: Certificate Transparency Breakout Room (Part I)
item.description: Certificate Transparency Breakout Room (Part I) The breakout session on Certificate Transparency offers a valuable opportunity for members of the ecosystem to come together to brainstorm ways to make CT more robust and address emerging challenges. Industry practitioners as well as those new to the space are welcome to join. Preliminary Agenda TBD Session Leader: TBD description

item.title: Certificate Transparency Breakout Room (Part II)
item.description: Certificate Transparency Breakout Room (Part II) The Certificate Transparency breakout continues after the break. The breakout session on Certificate Transparency offers a valuable opportunity for members of the ecosystem to come together to brainstorm ways to make CT more robust and address emerging challenges. Industry practitioners as well as those new to the space are welcome to join. Preliminary Agenda TBD Session Leader: TBD description

item.title: Closing Session
item.description: Closing out the talk portion of the event we will have a fun closing quiz and some awards. Talk Recording

item.title: Registration
item.description: A registration desk will be set up at the reception of TBD. Attendees will pick up their badges there and then be escorted up to the event space. Enjoy some coffee and breakfast and get to know your fellow conference attendees ahead of the talk sessions. Please be aware that attendees will be required to pick up a new badge each day they attend the conference. Breakfast Freshly brewed filter coffee, a selection of Clipper tea infusions Pressed orange juice Selection of pastries and preserves

item.title: Transparency.dev Summit 2025 Schedule
item.description: Transparency.dev Summit 2025 Schedule The schedule for the 2025 summit is currently a work in progress and may change. Full Schedule Monday, 20th October 9:00am Registration 10:00am Welcome 10:15am Keynote 10:45am Break 11:00am Certificate Transparency talks (x3) 12:30pm Lunch 2:00pm Certificate Transparency talks (x3 with break) 3:45pm Breakout sessions 5:00pm Lightning talks 5:30pm Closing remarks Evening Activities (TBD) Tuesday, 21st October 9:00am Welcome 9:15am Talks (x5 with break) 12:30pm Lunch 2:00pm Talks (x3 with break) 3:45pm Breakout sessions 5:00pm Lightning talks 5:30pm Closing remarks Evening Social dinner - location TBC, within walking distance of venue Wednesday, 22nd October 9:00am Welcome 9:15am Quiz 10:00am Lightning talks (unscheduled) 10:45am Breakout sessions 12:00pm Close
